objects.text:
• Premium pink-toned cosmetics
• Long-lasting, pigment-rich formula
• Mirror-equipped compact for on-the-go

product_details.name: Pink Perfection: Luxury Lipstick & Blush Duo Set
product_details.description:
• Premium pink-toned lipstick in sleek silver and black packaging
• Matching powder blush compact with built-in mirror
• Long-lasting, pigment-rich color formula
• Travel-friendly compact design with secure closure
• Professional-grade makeup essentials for a coordinated look
• Soft, buildable pink shades suitable for all skin tones
• Mirror-equipped compact for touch-ups on the go
• Luxurious matte black packaging with modern aesthetic
• Perfect for creating natural flush and rosy lip combo
• Ideal for daily wear and special occasions

banner_details:
This promotional banner is a cosmetic product advertisement with a clean and modern layout. The left half features a soft pink gradient background with subtle circular accents, adding depth. Prominently at the top is a bold, attention-grabbing header (`heading`), followed by a subtitle (`subheading`) that gives context to the product offering. A short bullet list (`description`) highlights key features. Beneath that is a pricing callout (`price`) in large bold text to draw attention. Below it lies an eye-catching rectangular CTA button (`cta_button`) labeled with action text (`cta`) in white. Reinforcing urgency, a contrasting secondary offer banner (`offer_banner`) with bold uppercase text (`offer_text`) is placed near the bottom. The right half displays a scaled product image (`product_image`) showcasing a lipstick and blush compact, balancing visual interest and product clarity.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink: `#FFCCD8`
- Bright Pink: `#FF5C85`
- Soft Rose: `#FF9BB3`
- Deep Gray: `#333333`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a makeup set featuring a lipstick and compact blush, primarily in shades of soft pink. The dominant color is a light, vibrant pink (#EC8FC6), used both in the lipstick and blush, creating a cohesive and feminine visual appeal. This is contrasted with sleek black (#1A1A1A) packaging, giving it a modern, sophisticated frame. The metallic silver (#C0C0C0) of the lipstick tube adds shine and blends smoothly without muted the central pink tone. The mirror's subtle gray tones (#E6E6E6) reflect and amplify the product's hues. These colors harmoniously blend while keeping the pink as the focal highlight, perfect for a clean, elegant banner.
